title: Incident at Hawk's Hill
brief_description: A story based on Allan W. Eckert’s novel “Incident at Hawk’s Hill” about a shy, lonely six-year-old who wanders into the Canadian Prairie and spends a summer under the protection of a badger. Edited from the motion picture entitled “The Boy who talked to badgers”, originally shown in 1974 on the teelevision program “The Wonderful World of Disney”.
